description: A layer in a PSD image or PDF file.

properties.description: The name of the GraphicLayer.
properties.name: name

properties.description: Returns the visibility setting set for the layer before the graphic file was imported. Note: Must occur in the script before overriding the visibility state with a current visibility statement.
properties.name: originalVisibility

properties.description: If true, the layer is a separator layer.
properties.name: separatorLayer

properties.description: If true, the layer is an adjustment layer. Note: Must occur in the script before overriding the visibility state of the layer with a current visibility statement.
properties.name: adjustmentLayer

properties.description: If true, layer effects have been applied to the layer. Note: Must occur in the script before overriding the visibility state of the layer with a current visibility statement.
properties.name: fxLayer

properties.description: If true, the GraphicLayer is locked.
properties.name: locked

properties.description: If true, the layer is a section divider layer.
properties.name: sectionDividerLayer

properties.description: If true, the layer has a view state.
properties.name: hasViewState

properties.description: If true, the view state is on.
properties.name: viewState

properties.description: If true, the layer has an export state.
properties.name: hasExportState

properties.description: If true, the export state is on.
properties.name: exportState

properties.description: If true, the layer has a print state.
properties.name: hasPrintState

properties.description: If true, the print state is on.
properties.name: printState

properties.description: The unique ID of the GraphicLayer.
properties.name: id

properties.description: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.
properties.name: isValid

properties.description: The parent of the GraphicLayer (a GraphicLayerOption or GraphicLayer).
properties.name: parent

properties.description: The index of the GraphicLayer within its containing object.
properties.name: index

properties.description: A collection of events.
properties.name: events

properties.description: A collection of event listeners.
properties.name: eventListeners

properties.description: A collection of graphic layers.
properties.name: graphicLayers

properties.description: If true, the layer is visible in the document.
properties.name: currentVisibility

properties.description: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.
properties.name: properties

methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the GraphicLayer.
methods.name: toSource

methods.description: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.
methods.name: getElements

parameters.description: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
parameters.name: handler

parameters.description: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
parameters.name: handler

name: GraphicLayer
